meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ongoing.
meanings.sent1: The ongoingnesses of the project kept everyone busy.
meanings.sent2: The ongoingnesses of the rain made the roads slippery.
meanings.sent3: The ongoingnesses of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ongoingnesses of the river symbolized the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The ongoingnesses of the music filled the room with energy.

meanings.definition: The continuation or progress of something.
meanings.sent1: The ongoingnesses of the story kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent2: The ongoingnesses of the construction project impressed the investors.
meanings.sent3: The ongoingnesses of the game made it more exciting.
meanings.sent4: The ongoingnesses of the relationship reflected commitment.
meanings.sent5: The ongoingnesses of the debate showed dedication from both sides.
